section: config.h src/config.h Go to the documentation of this file.1 /* 2 * File: config.h 3 * Author: Javier Mendoza 4 * 5 * Created on 1 de septiembre de 2024, 07:28 PM 6 */ 7 8 #ifndef CONFIG_H 9 #define CONFIG_H 10 11 #ifdef __cplusplus 12 extern "C" { 13 #endif 14 15 16 // PIC18F45K50 Configuration Bit Settings 17 18 // 'C' source line config statements 19 20 // CONFIG1L 21 #pragma config PLLSEL = PLL3X // PLL Selection (4x clock multiplier) 22 #pragma config CFGPLLEN = ON // PLL Enable Configuration bit (PLL Disabled (firmware controlled)) 23 #pragma config CPUDIV = NOCLKDIV// CPU System Clock Postscaler (CPU uses system clock (no divide)) 24 #pragma config LS48MHZ = SYS48X8// Low Speed USB mode with 48 MHz system clock (System clock at 48 MHz, USB clock divider is set to 8) 25 26 // CONFIG1H 27 #pragma config FOSC = INTOSCCLKO// Oscillator Selection (Internal oscillator, clock output on OSC2) 28 #pragma config PCLKEN = OFF // Primary Oscillator Shutdown (Primary oscillator shutdown firmware controlled) 29 #pragma config FCMEN = OFF // Fail-Safe Clock Monitor (Fail-Safe Clock Monitor disabled) 30 #pragma config IESO = OFF // Internal/External Oscillator Switchover (Oscillator Switchover mode disabled) 31 32 // CONFIG2L 33 #pragma config nPWRTEN = OFF // Power-up Timer Enable (Power up timer disabled) 34 #pragma config BOREN = SBORDIS // Brown-out Reset Enable (BOR enabled in hardware (SBOREN is ignored)) 35 #pragma config BORV = 190 // Brown-out Reset Voltage (BOR set to 1.9V nominal) 36 #pragma config nLPBOR = OFF // Low-Power Brown-out Reset (Low-Power Brown-out Reset disabled) 37 38 // CONFIG2H 39 #pragma config WDTEN = OFF // Watchdog Timer Enable bits (WDT enabled in hardware (SWDTEN ignored)) 40 #pragma config WDTPS = 32768 // Watchdog Timer Postscaler (1:32768) 41 42 // CONFIG3H 43 #pragma config CCP2MX = RC1 // CCP2 MUX bit (CCP2 input/output is multiplexed with RC1) 44 #pragma config PBADEN = ON // PORTB A/D Enable bit (PORTB<5:0> pins are configured as analog input channels on Reset) 45 #pragma config T3CMX = RC0 // Timer3 Clock Input MUX bit (T3CKI function is on RC0) 46 #pragma config SDOMX = RB3 // SDO Output MUX bit (SDO function is on RB3) 47 #pragma config MCLRE = ON // Master Clear Reset Pin Enable (MCLR pin enabled; RE3 input disabled) 48 49 // CONFIG4L 50 #pragma config STVREN = ON // Stack Full/Underflow Reset (Stack full/underflow will cause Reset) 51 #pragma config LVP = ON // Single-Supply ICSP Enable bit (Single-Supply ICSP enabled if MCLRE is also 1) 52 #pragma config ICPRT = OFF // Dedicated In-Circuit Debug/Programming Port Enable (ICPORT disabled) 53 #pragma config XINST = OFF // Extended Instruction Set Enable bit (Instruction set extension and Indexed Addressing mode disabled) 54 55 // CONFIG5L 56 #pragma config CP0 = OFF // Block 0 Code Protect (Block 0 is not code-protected) 57 #pragma config CP1 = OFF // Block 1 Code Protect (Block 1 is not code-protected) 58 #pragma config CP2 = OFF // Block 2 Code Protect (Block 2 is not code-protected) 59 #pragma config CP3 = OFF // Block 3 Code Protect (Block 3 is not code-protected) 60 61 // CONFIG5H 62 #pragma config CPB = OFF // Boot Block Code Protect (Boot block is not code-protected) 63 #pragma config CPD = OFF // Data EEPROM Code Protect (Data EEPROM is not code-protected) 64 65 // CONFIG6L 66 #pragma config WRT0 = OFF // Block 0 Write Protect (Block 0 (0800-1FFFh) is not write-protected) 67 #pragma config WRT1 = OFF // Block 1 Write Protect (Block 1 (2000-3FFFh) is not write-protected) 68 #pragma config WRT2 = OFF // Block 2 Write Protect (Block 2 (04000-5FFFh) is not write-protected) 69 #pragma config WRT3 = OFF // Block 3 Write Protect (Block 3 (06000-7FFFh) is not write-protected) 70 71 // CONFIG6H 72 #pragma config WRTC = OFF // Configuration Registers Write Protect (Configuration registers (300000-3000FFh) are not write-protected) 73 #pragma config WRTB = OFF // Boot Block Write Protect (Boot block (0000-7FFh) is not write-protected) 74 #pragma config WRTD = OFF // Data EEPROM Write Protect (Data EEPROM is not write-protected) 75 76 // CONFIG7L 77 #pragma config EBTR0 = OFF // Block 0 Table Read Protect (Block 0 is not protected from table reads executed in other blocks) 78 #pragma config EBTR1 = OFF // Block 1 Table Read Protect (Block 1 is not protected from table reads executed in other blocks) 79 #pragma config EBTR2 = OFF // Block 2 Table Read Protect (Block 2 is not protected from table reads executed in other blocks) 80 #pragma config EBTR3 = OFF // Block 3 Table Read Protect (Block 3 is not protected from table reads executed in other blocks) 81 82 // CONFIG7H 83 #pragma config EBTRB = OFF // Boot Block Table Read Protect (Boot block is not protected from table reads executed in other blocks) 84 85 // #pragma config statements should precede project file includes. 86 // Use project enums instead of #define for ON and OFF. 87 88 89 90 #ifdef __cplusplus 91 } 92 #endif 93 94 #endif /* CONFIG_H */ 95
